package.name: CamScripts
package.description: CamScripts ToolBit import or script creation and configure *every* step of FreeCAD CAM process.
package.author: spanner888

workbench.name: CamScripts
workbench.description: Automation of ToolBit import and scripted creation, with very flexible naming rules. Automation of every step of the CAM process, from tool creation to G-code generation. Demonstrate speeds and feeds calculations using the newly released Machinability Materials. Additional demonstration of Materials Machinability model to provide data for Speeds and Feeds, including exploring of fz (chipload) tables.

macro.name: CamScripts CSV Import
macro.description: CSV bulk Import with naming rules

macro.name: CamScripts Add Tool Bits
macro.description: Create ranges of ToolBits with naming rules

macro.name: CamScripts Full Process Example
macro.description: Create and recreate every step of the CAM process, from tool creation to G-code generation

macro.name: READMEs
macro.description: Readmes and also find naming rules and CSV files
